purpose: Facilitate the creation and automation of multi-step workflows using AI agents, tools, and plugins
principle: Leverages Python-based AI frameworks and custom plugins to automate and enhance task execution
reusability: Supports custom workflows and plugins, offering a flexible API for integration with various tools
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited documentation on complex integrations
name: toolmate
description: ToolMate AI, developed by Eliran Wong, is a cutting-edge AI companion that seamlessly integrates agents, tools, and plugins to excel in conversations, generative work, and task execution. Supports custom workflow and plugins to automate multi-step actions.
highlight: Seamless integration of agents, tools, and plugins for enhanced conversational and generative tasks
